detaileddescription.para:
maximum size of CONSTANT_CDL_SECURING
value 16u

maximum of return requests via KS function in the state "busy"
value 50u

maximum of return requests received by ZVLight in state "pending"
values 50u

negative response code when the CDL signature cannot be stored in NvM
values 0x10U

negative response code when the CDL securing function receives "busy"
values 0x21U

negative response code when the CDL securing function receives "nok"
values 0x22U

return request result via (KS) function
values 2u

count the reception of these messages for which the signal is set
value 23u

mask used for signature calculation
value 0x07FFU
For SWATT testing
SWATT bypassing used for testing.

Variable used to store the encryption result .
range - array of uint8 unit N/A resolution N/A context ZVLight_GenSignAndErrorHandling, ZVLight_InitVarFunc protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Flag used for status of encryption
values FALSE - encryption not done TRUE - encryption done unit N/A resolution N/A context EncryptData, ZVLight_WriteSignatureToNVM protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Flag used for status of calculation ZV signature
values FALSE - ZV signature calculation not finished TRUE - ZV signature calculation finished unit N/A resolution N/A context EncryptData protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

ZV signature sent to NvM . Flag used for status of storing ZV signature
values FALSE - ZV signature was not sent to NVM TRUE - ZV signature was sent to NVM unit N/A resolution N/A context EncryptData, ZVLight_WriteSignatureToNVM protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Variable contains ZV Signature value
range - uint16 unit N/A resolution N/A context ZVLight_GenSignAndErrorHandling, ZVLight_WriteSignatureToNVM protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Counter used during ZV signature calculation. Variable used to count "Busy" response received from Rte_Call_ZVLight_CompProt_AesGfaKeyPoll.
range [0...51] unit N/A resolution N/A context ZVLight_StartEncryption, ZVLight_GenSignAndErrorHandling protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_Light_199

Counter used for NvM write operation Variable used to count "Pending" response received from NVM.
range - [0...51] unit N/A resolution N/A context EncryptData, ZVLight_WriteSignatureToNVM protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Variable that indicates if the encryption could be started
values - [E_OK, E_NOT_OK, E_BUSY] unit N/A resolution N/A context EncryptData, ZVLight_InitVarFunc protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_Light_124

PIM used for NVM storage. Variable contains ZV Signature
range - uint16 unit N/A resolution N/A context NVM operations, ZVLight_SetSignals, ZVLight_SetDtcIfNotActiveAndSignatureNotSet protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_Light_134

Flag used to check if readAll() function was successful
values FALSE - read was not succeed and request canceled TRUE - read was succeed unit N/A resolution N/A context ZVLight_ReadSignatureFromNVM, ZVLight_InitVarFunc protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Flag from callback of the KS function
values TRUE - when no available key in NvM FALSE - otherwise
unit N/A resolution N/A context ZVLight_ResetSignature, NVM operation protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Security-Relevant. Reason: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_Light_134

Flag used to check if the ZV signature is stored successfully from NvM
values FALSE - ZV signature cannot be stored to NVM TRUE - ZV signature successfully stored unit N/A resolution N/A context NVM operations protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

ZVLight_Counter structure variable
range see ZVLight_Counter structure values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class init ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

This flag shows that the module was initialized
range TRUE if ZVLight_InitVarFunc is called FALSE otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class init ram

Function that models the encryption result. The generated signature will contain the last 11 bits of the encryption and if it has the value 0, it will be set to 1.
reentrant No context ZVLight_EncryptData function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Source
ZVLight_Task.c Revision
version Author
uic43108 Date
2023/01/20 Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1/CTC). Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
